title: Eyeballs
data:
<noinclude>''For the monster type, see [[list of eyeballs]].''</noinclude>

{| cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" border="1"
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
|Rank||Effect||Flavor
|-
|1||+3 to hit. Chance to cause [[confusion]] in foes who attack you in melee.||Your body has grown eyes which may confuse attackers.
|-
|2||+5 to hit. Higher chance to cause [[confusion]] in foes who attack you in melee.||Your body has grown many eyes which may confuse attackers.
|-
|3||+7 to hit and [[see invisible]]. Highest chance to cause [[confusion]] in foes who attack you in melee.||Your body is covered in eyes which may confuse attackers.
|- 
| colspan="3" |
Chance is 5%, 10%, or 15%. Checks will.
|- style="font-style:italic;" 
| colspan="3" |
[[Jiyva mutation]]
|}
